DOC.criteria: Participants healthy subject age 18 . Men woman recruit participation . All ethnicity include study . Exclusionary criterion include : age 18 year 60 year age , unable understand consent process , read speak English , history cancer , peripheral artery disease , diabetes mellitus , active pregnancy , hypersensitivity perflutren contrast agent , pulmonary hypertension , chronic kidney disease , active tobacco drug use , blood pressure 160/90 , BMI > 30 , sickle cell disease , history intracardiac shunt .
